metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: Similar to Brave and Tangled, this animated adventure features a heartwarming story about an unlikely friendship and exciting flying sequences.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
metas.description: Continues the epic adventures and emotional depth of the first film, with stunning animation and engaging characters.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
metas.description: A satisfying conclusion to the trilogy, offering breathtaking visuals and a powerful message about acceptance and growing up.

metas.name: Moana
metas.description: Like Coco and Tangled, this Disney animated musical adventure features a strong protagonist, beautiful music, and a journey of self-discovery with a touch of fantasy.

metas.name: The Incredibles
metas.description: A fun, action-packed animated film with a family focus, similar to the spirit of Zootopia and the Kung Fu Panda movies.

metas.name: The Incredibles 2
metas.description: More thrilling adventures with the super-powered Parr family, maintaining the humor and excitement of the original.

metas.name: Ratatouille
metas.description: A charming and funny animated film about following your dreams, with a unique premise that kids will find delightful, echoing the creativity of Miyazaki films.

metas.name: Finding Nemo
metas.description: An underwater adventure with a strong father-son bond and a colorful, imaginative world, similar to the family and adventure elements in Ponyo and My Neighbor Totoro.

metas.name: Finding Dory
metas.description: A heartwarming sequel that explores themes of memory and family, with plenty of humor and engaging characters.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A live-action family comedy with a lot of heart and charm, much like the feel-good nature of Wallace & Gromit and Shrek.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: Universally praised for its wit, warmth, and visual gags, this sequel is a delightful adventure for the whole family.

metas.name: Kubo and the Two Strings
metas.description: A visually stunning stop-motion animated film with an epic fantasy adventure and beautiful storytelling, resonating with the magic found in Kiki's Delivery Service and Spirited Away.

metas.name: The Mitchells vs. the Machines
metas.description: A hilarious and action-packed animated comedy about a quirky family saving the world from a robot apocalypse, similar in humor and spirit to The Bad Guys and Zootopia.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
metas.description: A groundbreaking animated film with incredible visuals, a compelling story, and great humor, fitting the adventurous and creative aspects of the watched films.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
metas.description: Continues the dazzling visual style and exciting narrative of its predecessor with more multiverse adventure.

metas.name: Enchanted
metas.description: A charming blend of live-action and animation that playfully spoofs fairytale tropes, similar to the fantasy elements in Shrek and Kiki's Delivery Service.

metas.name: The Princess and the Frog
metas.description: A vibrant animated musical adventure with a strong female lead and a magical New Orleans setting, echoing the musicality of Coco and Sing, and the fairytale feel of Tangled.

metas.name: Rio
metas.description: A colorful and musical animated adventure set in Brazil, featuring lively characters and a journey of self-discovery, similar to the upbeat nature of Sing and Zootopia.

metas.name: Rio 2
metas.description: More fun and music in the Amazon rainforest, with a focus on family and adventure.

metas.name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
metas.description: A visually unique and witty stop-motion animated film with a mischievous adventure, similar to the comedic and adventurous spirit of The Bad Guys and Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: The Lego Movie
metas.description: A fast-paced, hilarious, and visually inventive animated comedy with a great message, aligning with the humor and creativity of Shrek and Kung Fu Panda.

metas.name: The Lego Batman Movie
metas.description: A laugh-out-loud parody with a surprisingly heartfelt core, offering a comedic adventure in the vein of The Bad Guys and Zootopia.

metas.name: Ernest & Celestine
metas.description: A beautiful and gentle animated film with a heartwarming story about an unlikely friendship, reminiscent of the quiet charm of Kiki's Delivery Service and Ponyo.

metas.name: Song of the Sea
metas.description: A visually stunning animated film inspired by Irish folklore, offering a magical and emotional adventure, akin to the fantasy and family themes of Spirited Away and My Neighbor Totoro.

metas.name: The Red Turtle
metas.description: A meditative and visually gorgeous animated film with a unique storytelling approach, appealing to those who enjoyed the artistic nature of Studio Ghibli films.

metas.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
metas.description: A wacky and inventive animated comedy with a high-concept premise and plenty of laughs, similar to the humor of Shrek and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
metas.description: Continues the zany food-themed adventures with more creative and humorous situations.

metas.name: The Willoughbys
metas.description: A darkly humorous and visually distinct animated film about four children who are abandoned by their selfish parents and embark on an adventure, similar to the quirky humor of The Bad Guys.

metas.name: ParaNorman
metas.description: A stop-motion animated film with a charmingly spooky (but not too scary) story about a boy who can see ghosts, offering a blend of comedy and adventure that might appeal to fans of fantasy.

metas.name: Isle of Dogs
metas.description: A visually distinctive stop-motion animated film with a unique adventure about a boy searching for his lost dog, offering a quirky and engaging narrative.

metas.name: The Princess Bride
metas.description: A beloved fantasy adventure comedy with a perfect blend of humor, romance, and action, resonating with the timeless appeal of Shrek and Brave.

metas.name: Ron's Gone Wrong
metas.description: A funny and heartfelt animated film about a boy and his malfunctioning robot best friend, with themes of friendship and technology that might appeal to fans of Zootopia and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Trollhunters: Rise of the Titans
metas.description: An epic animated adventure that brings together characters from the Trollhunters series, offering a grand fantasy quest.

metas.name: The Iron Giant
metas.description: A timeless animated classic about an unlikely friendship between a boy and a giant robot, with a powerful message and a touch of sci-fi adventure.

metas.name: Arthur Christmas
metas.description: A clever and hilarious animated comedy about how Santa delivers presents, with a secret mission and a heartwarming family dynamic.

metas.name: The Croods
metas.description: A prehistoric animated adventure comedy about a cave family on a journey to find a new home, full of humor and exciting discoveries.

metas.name: The Croods: A New Age
metas.description: Continues the hilarious and adventurous exploits of the Crood family with new characters and more prehistoric fun.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: A charming and funny stop-motion animated film about a group of chickens trying to escape their farm, a delightful adventure with a great sense of humor.

metas.name: Mary and the Witch's Flower
metas.description: A vibrant and magical animated adventure from Studio Ponoc, reminiscent of the early Studio Ghibli films like Kiki's Delivery Service with its fantastical elements and young protagonist.
